'''The Philippine Tolkien Society''', PTS, was the [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien society]] in the Philippines.

==History==
As at 2011 the PTS website is in disrepair and the most recent posts date from 2008. Consequently it can be assumed PTS is now defunct.<ref>http://www.thephilippinetolkiensociety.org/ (accessed 05-12-2011)</ref>

==Magazine==
Whilst active PTS published its magazine Quento.<ref>http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/wiwimod/index.php?page=PhilippinesTS (accessed 05-12-2011)</ref> The 5 issues known to have been released all focused on the Peter Jackson movie.
